Headline: #N4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute near Madison/Wabash
ShortDescription: #N4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Madison/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#N4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Madison/Wabash.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus (Layover).

Southbound buses will operate via Columbus, South Water, Michigan, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #N22 Clark Temporary Northbound Reroute near Madison/Wabash
ShortDescription: NB #N22 Clark buses are rerouted via Clark, Polk, Dearborn, then resume their normal route (bypass Washington/State), due to street blockage nr Madison/Wabash

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #N22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Polk, Dearborn, then resume their normal route (bypass Washington/State), due to street blockage near Madison/Wabash.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #N66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Madison/Wabash
ShortDescription: #N66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Madison/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#N66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Madison/Wabash.

Eastbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, State/Lake (Layover).

Westbound buses will operate via State, Wacker, Michigan, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
